mapper.select: select * from room order by room_no
mapper.insert:
SELECT room_seq.nextval FROM dual
INSERT INTO room ( room_no, user_no, room_category_no, room_name, room_introduce, room_member, room_public ) VALUES ( #{roomNo }, #{userNo }, #{roomCategoryNo }, #{roomName }, #{roomIntroduce }, #{roomMember }, #{roomPublic } )

SELECT room_list_seq.nextval FROM dual
INSERT INTO room_list ( room_list_no, room_no, user_no ) VALUES ( #{roomListNo }, #{roomNo }, #{userNo } )
